What We Do?

Weekly Sessions

The weekly sessions are soul of our club. A session usually consists of 2 presentations on contemporary ideas and new innovations in the field of technology, followed by a Q&A session after every presentation and then a Group Discuss ion. They are based on the newest technologies in the worlds. It is a good way to keep updates with the newest ideas. Every session will have 2 speakers presenting a topic each and after the sessions we debate about the idea and there is an interactive session with the speakers. This not only improves their verbal skills but also increases the student’s confidence as they will be speaking in front of a large group as well as their presentation skills.

Workshops, Guest Lecture & Fun Events

One of many great features of it is it’s workshops. Our workshops are not like usual classes, but they rather provide students a hand on learning experience. Main aim of our workshops is to provide students an interactive environment where they can devel fine tune and hone their skills. Workshops basically focuses on making students aware of what is going on in industries all around the world, so that they can be prepared to cater the demand of industries in future and to cope with upcoming challenges.

Publishing Research Papers & Projects

The weekly A session usually consists of 2 presentations on contemporary ideas and new innovations in the field of technology, followed by a Q&A session after every the newest ideas.Every session will have 2 speakers presenting a topic each and after the sessions we debate about the idea and there is an interactive session with the speakers. This not only improves their verbal skills but also increases the student’s confidence as they will be speaking in front of a large group as well as their presentation skills.
